class.rdfs:comment: A direction indicating a single action to do in the instructions for how to achieve a result.
class.rdfs:label: HowToDirection

schema:afterMedia.rdfs:comment: A media object representing the circumstances after performing this direction.
schema:afterMedia.rdfs:label: afterMedia

schema:beforeMedia.rdfs:comment: A media object representing the circumstances before performing this direction.
schema:beforeMedia.rdfs:label: beforeMedia

schema:duringMedia.rdfs:comment: A media object representing the circumstances while performing this direction.
schema:duringMedia.rdfs:label: duringMedia

schema:performTime.rdfs:comment: The length of time it takes to perform instructions or a direction (not including time to prepare the supplies), in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).
schema:performTime.rdfs:label: performTime

schema:prepTime.rdfs:comment: The length of time it takes to prepare the items to be used in instructions or a direction, in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).
schema:prepTime.rdfs:label: prepTime

schema:supply.rdfs:comment: A sub-property of instrument. A supply consumed when performing instructions or a direction.
schema:supply.rdfs:label: supply

schema:tool.rdfs:comment: A sub property of instrument. An object used (but not consumed) when performing instructions or a direction.
schema:tool.rdfs:label: tool

schema:totalTime.rdfs:comment: The total time required to perform instructions or a direction (including time to prepare the supplies), in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).
schema:totalTime.rdfs:label: totalTime
